episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4001_1:
Your combination is as good as ours.
It’s the best—perfect!

But of course! Me and my eldest sis, Morgan—
together, we can’t be beat!

Now, Nita. There you go again, speaking with
such cheek.

I see the Subway Bosses are every bit as strong
as they’re rumored to be.

It seems we must strive for even greater heights...
But how?

I’ve been thinking about that, Ingo. I have
an idea.
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4002_1:
Today, we’d like to take this opportunity to make
an announcement!
We...will be holding a tag battle tournament!

Team battles on Pasio are usually three versus
three...

But we want you all to see how fun and deep tag
battles can be!
That’s why we’re holding a tournament!
Previous tag battle experience not required!

In fact, we heartily welcome those who’ve never
tag battled!
If you think it’d be fun, please join!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/6801_1:
In tag battles, different combinations can change
the course of battle. That’s what makes them fun!

Competitors working together with their partners
to sway the tide of battle makes for a fine
spectacle indeed!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4003_1:
For our tag battle, Liza and I will be battling you
and Tate?!
We twins will split up for the tournament!

I... I thought we’d form our own tag team
as brothers.

Aren’t we participating specifically to improve our
teamwork? As a two-car train?

We asked people to join the tournament to try a
new challenge—and we must do the same!
If we form new teams, we may see new sights!
Tate and Liza feel the same!
Let’s battle together as partners, Liza!

Yeah! Let’s show Tate’s team our winning
combination!
I look forward to battling you two!

If we’re having a battle, we should make it a
serious one. Let’s battle with all we’ve got!

Yes! We’ll link up in new ways and aim for the
destination called Victory!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4004_1:
Let’s push ourselves—and our moves—to the limit.
That’ll make for a fun battle!
You’re really getting into this, Emmet!
Yes! I haven’t been this excited in a long time!

Maybe it’s because I feel closer to Eelektross in
this sygna suit. But mostly, it’s because I’m going
to battle Ingo!
I look forward to that most of all!

And just thinking about seeing his teamwork with
Liza excites me!

We gotta work on our teamwork, too, so our
battle with them can be the greatest!
And the best way to do that is with real battles!

Let’s have some serious battles with more Pasio
sync pairs! All aboard!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4005_1:
Tate suggested something like this when we first
got to Pasio.

We’d usually do everything together because
we’re twins...

But he said maybe we’d learn something new if
we tried splitting up.

It seems you two were already one stop farther
down the line than us! Impressive!

Also, a while ago I got separated from Tate when
I was sucked into an Ultra Wormhole!

At the time, I felt more deeply connected to Tate
than ever!

It made me realize how grateful I am that we
care so much for each other and can spend so
much time together!

Then I shall push forward in hope of our reaching
the same destination as you two.

...Emmet and I donned these complementary
sygna suits to give us a fresh start.

I simply cannot wait to see what awaits us at the
end of this battle!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4006_1:
Fierce battles continued one after another as
various sync pairs took part in the tag battle
tournament...
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4007_1:
Until at last, it was time for Ingo and Liza versus
Emmet and Tate.
My sygna suit isn’t the only new thing about me.

Through training, I’ve also prepared new moves
and combinations!
The same goes for us!

We’ve perfected our teamwork. Let’s have a
serious battle!

There is nothing else to say now that we’ve come
all the way here!

Let’s have the greatest battle—better than ever
before.

Yes! Show me your teamwork with your Pokémon
and new tag battle partner!
All aboard!
Ahhh! No way...

But my Pokémon and I made such a good
combo...
So it is down to you and me...

Now that it’s come to this, it’s time to use my
secret weapon!
I can’t lose! I’ll use my last resort!
Chandelure! Dynamax!!!
Eelektross! Dynamax!!!
Both Pokémon fainted. That means...
...It’s a tie.

But...we gained something far greater than
victory!

If we’d continued to only battle together, we
never would’ve noticed just how in sync we
truly are!

And fighting separately showed us our strengths
and unique styles.

Giving my all in a serious battle with you, Ingo
and Liza...
It was the most fun I’ve ever had!
Agreed!

That Pokémon battle made me want to shout
“Bravo!” from the depths of my heart!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4008_1: A few days later...
We’ve come to visit you, Subway Bosses!
Welcome, and thank you for coming!

We eagerly await challenges from laudable guests
such as yourselves.
Now, please board!
Might we have another battle with you two?
Of course! You’re welcome anytime!

We’ll show you what our combined efforts can do
now that we’ve put them in higher gear!
*giggle*

I can tell you’ve grown stronger just by looking
at you.
Yes, I can too.

It seems you truly gained something from your tag
battle tournament!

You mean because the twins split to form separate
teams?
Weren’t you lonely when you were apart?
No, not at all!

Even when we’re on different tracks, as long as
we’re headed for the same destination, we trust
those tracks will meet again!

That’s how it is when you have unshakable
strength as twins, we’ve learned.

After all, we both came up with the same secret
plan: Dynamax!

But even so, we truly do have a remarkable
relationship.

He understands me more than anyone else—as if
he were a mirror reflecting my own identity...

And just as some strive to overcome their former
selves, he is perhaps my greatest rival.
Right!
The hardest loss of all...
would be losing a battle to you, Ingo!

Because you two are twins, you’re both perfectly
in sync and highly competitive with each other.
And because we’re sisters, so are we.
I think our relationship is very similar.

Being born into the same family as your
greatest rival...
What a lucky turn of fate!
episode_event_ch0108_10_ch0109_10/4009_1:
The time we spent apart has made our bond
even stronger!

We combined the new strengths we each
acquired...

and now we’ll show you how we’ve polished our
teamwork to an even greater shine!

Our bonds were strengthened just as much
as yours!
Together as twins, we’re an invincible team!
We won’t lose even to you two!
Good! We know just how strong you are!

We’ll demonstrate the full extent of our bond—
as twins and as Subway Bosses!
